name: Samuel G Rodriguez
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hey, good evening. I'm Sammy. I was born in LA and went to live in Vegas. I have been working on many projects and jobs in the past 4 years. I deliver bud right now from 12pm to 12 am. I close shop and submit orders and donations. I also know wassup with the scale, bags, dialogues with clients and serving with excellent customer service.
experience:

Food 4 Less (2013-2015)

-Front Desk Clerk

-Cashier

-Night stocker

- (final post) Meat Clerk


Warehouse Laborer (2015-2016)

-Loader/Unloader

-(final post) Driver Associate


Dank Deliveries(2017- )

-Delivery driver (PT)

-Delivery driver (FT)
